alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Northern Columbia; Suwannee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 9:03PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Columbia, northeastern Suwannee, eastern Hamilton and southeastern Echols Counties through 945 PM EDT... At 903 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Live Oak to near Needmore. These storms were nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds of 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Live Oak, Belmont, Needmore and Houston. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
